docTitle.titlePart:
Layer-by-Layer Assembled Multilayer Films for
Transcutaneous Drug and Vaccine Delivery

byline.docAuthor: Xingfang Su, Byeong-Su Kim, Sara R. Kim, Paula T. Hammond and Darrell J. Irvine

front.div:
Figure S1. Chemical structures of Poly-1 and Poly-2 used in this study. Their molecular
weights are 8,000 -10,000 g/mol.
Figure S2. Loading of Ova into multilayers prepared by sequential deposition of 15
bilayers of Poly-1/ova. For each condition, ova was deposited from pH 6 buffered
solutions and Poly-1 was deposited from buffered solutions of varying pH (5.0-6.5).
